Title: Manon of the Spring
Writer: Claude Berri (adaptation), Gérard Brach (adaptation), Marcel Pagnol (novel)
Actors: Yves Montand, Daniel Auteuil, Emmanuelle Béart, Hippolyte Girardot
Plot: In this, the sequel to Jean de Florette, Manon (Beart) has grown into a beautiful young shepherdess living in the idyllic Provencal countryside. She determines to take revenge upon the men responsible for the death of her father in the first film.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 4 wins & 2 nominations.
Production: Films A2, RAI Radiotelevisione Italiana, DD Productions
